#summary Getting Started Guide for developers


= Download =

Download and install the following programs:

  * [http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk-7u1-download-513651.html JDK]
  * [http://qt.nokia.com/downloads QT SDK]
  * [http://tortoisesvn.net/downloads.html Tortoise SVN]

= Configure Environment =
run the following in a CMD window session.
{{{
     setx JAVA_HOME "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01"
}}}
restart QTCreator or any shell sessions you are using after using setx
= Developement Guide Lines =

Do not work in directly in trunk!

  # Create a branch from `trunk/` into a topic branch `branches/myBugFix`.
  # Work in `branches/myBugFix`.
  # Get a [http://code.google.com/p/jrt-dma/issues/entry?show=review&former=sourcelist Code Review].
  # once Code Review has been approved by another team member, merge code into trunk
